## Connect.snapshot() method

Retrieves a snapshot of data for the specified resource.

**Signature:**

```typescript
snapshot(resourceName: string, params?: any): Promise<Message>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  resourceName | string | The name of the resource to retrieve the snapshot for. |
|  params | any | _(Optional)_ Additional parameters to pass to the server. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[Message](./foundation-comms.message.md)&gt;

A promise that resolves with the snapshot data.
